channel.title: 'Else' without 'if' error driving me insane please help me

item.title: 'Else' without 'if' error driving me insane please help me
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Change it to this:

if(!list.contains(connectingHost)) { playerHandler.newPlayerClient(s, connectingHost); list.add(connectingHost); } else { System.err.println(connectingHost+" already connected!"); s.close(); } connectedList.add(connectingHost); [font=verdana]

Remember you can’t have other things in between the last parenthesis of the IF statement and the beginning of the ELSE statement.[/font]

Read full topic
item.source: 'Else' without 'if' error driving me insane please help me

item.title: 'Else' without 'if' error driving me insane please help me
item.dc:creator: @axlrose103 axlrose103
item.description:
@axlrose103 wrote:

Here’s the code:

if(!list.contains(connectingHost)) {
playerHandler.newPlayerClient(s, connectingHost);
list.add(connectingHost);

}
connectedList.add(connectingHost);

                 else {
System.err.println(connectingHost+" already connected!");
s.close();

}

Here’s the error:

Compiling - Please Wait…
server.java:189: error: ‘else’ without 'if’
else {
^
1 error
[Finished]
Press any key to continue . . .

Help A novice coder out?
